arguments.argument: /// Variables. type = HANG_STATIC; // Hang type (STATIC, SHIMMY or DISTANCE). distance = 0; // Distance to next grab handle. Only used if type equals DISTANCE. offset = 14; // Used to adjust the player's Y position. Default is 14. left = false; // Is it the most left handle? right = false; // Is it the most right handle? middle = false; // Is it a middle handle?
